summary: When you attack a skeever with fire (enchanted weapon, spell, shout) there is a strong likelihood that you will get a Charred Skeever Hide from it when it dies.
descriptionHtml:
So, I was killing skeevers by shouting Fire Breath at them the other day and got to thinking that I would expect to get a charred hide in addition to a tail. So, I wrote this very quick, very small mod to make it so.

Almost all skeevers will have a 4 out of 5 chance of having a charred hide on their body after death if, at least once during the combat, they have been hit by Fire Breath, a Fire based spell or a weapon with a Fire based enchantment.

[url=http://skse.silverlock.org/]Skyrim Script Extender (SKSE)[/url] is required.

Installation: Download with Nexus Mod Manager and enable the mod or manually decompress the mod archive into your Skyrim\\data directory and enable \"Char Your Own Skeevers.esp\"

Other CarlCorey mods:
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26491/]Training Dummies Provide XP[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/23007/]Fire and Forget Detection Spells[/url]
author: CarlCorey
